Package org.xadisk.filesystem

Class Summary
FileSystemConfiguration An object of this class encapsulates the configuration for the XADisk instance, and is used while booting of the XADisk instance.
FileSystemStateChangeEvent An object of this class represents a file system event published to an interested (as indicated through its activation-spec) MessageDrivenBean by XADisk.
 

Enum Summary
FileSystemStateChangeEvent.FileSystemEventType This enum represents the event type of a FileSystemStateChangeEvent object.
